com.spservices.friendmanager

Class UserProfile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spservices.friendmanager.UserProfile

  • public class UserProfile
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds user data and implements functions for adding friends or followers or blocks a user.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UserProfile(java.lang.String email)
      This is constructor to build user profile.
      UserProfile(java.lang.String email, java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.sql.Timestamp> friendsList, java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.sql.Timestamp> followerList, java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.sql.Timestamp> blockedList)
      This constructor initializes list of friends, followers and blocked emails.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UserProfile

        public UserProfile(java.lang.String email)
        This is constructor to build user profile.
        Parameters:
        email - user email id to identify user uniquely

      • UserProfile

        public UserProfile(java.lang.String email,
                   java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.sql.Timestamp> friendsList,
                   java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.sql.Timestamp> followerList,
                   java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.sql.Timestamp> blockedList)
        This constructor initializes list of friends, followers and blocked emails. This is handy constructor to be used for creating in memory data after reading it from persistant storage.
        Parameters:
        email - email id of user
        friendsList - Hashmap containing all friends and time when they were added last
        followerList - Hashmap containing all followers and time when they were added last
        blockedList - Hashmap containing all blocked contacts and time when they were added last
